means: （使）提高( sharpen的第三人称单数 )
（使）变得更好（或技术更高、更有效等）

sentence.Network_en: The use of Gilbert's method sharpens our field observations.
sentence.Network_cn: 吉尔伯特方法的应用使我们的观测结果更具有说服力.

sentence.Network_en: Mr Weaver talks with her while she sharpens her pencils.
sentence.Network_cn: 她一面削尖铅笔,韦佛先生一面跟她谈话.

sentence.Network_en: Cold weather sharpens the pain in my knee.
sentence.Network_cn: 寒冷使我膝盖的疼痛加剧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: night - time sharpens , heightens each sensation ., 夜晚让各种感觉更加敏锐强烈.
He that wrestles with us strengthens our nerves and sharpens our skill ., 和我们搏斗的人增强我们的神经 , 磨砺我们的技巧.
One man sharpens nails using a spinning blade attached to a moving bicycle wheel ., 一个男人在用转刀修剪指甲 , 转刀连在一辆移动的自行车轮上.

entry.tran: (感觉、理解)加强;(使)加深;(技巧)提高;(使)改善
entry.def: If your senses, understanding, or skills sharpen or are sharpened, you become better at noticing things, thinking, or doing something.

example.ex: Her gaze sharpened, as if she had seen something unusual...
example.tran: 她眼睛一亮，仿佛看见了什么不寻常的事情。

example.ex: You can sharpen your skills with rehearsal.
example.tran: 排练可以让技巧更加纯熟。

entry.def: If you sharpen an object, you make its edge very thin or you make its end pointed.

example.ex: He started to sharpen his knife.

entry.tran: (分歧、差异等)加剧;(使)加深;(使)加重
entry.def: If disagreements or differences between people sharpen, or if they are sharpened, they become bigger or more important.

example.ex: With urbanisation the antagonism between rich and poor sharpened...
example.tran: 伴随着城市化的推进，贫富间的对立情绪也加剧了。

example.ex: The case of Harris has sharpened the debate over capital punishment.
example.tran: 哈里斯案激化了人们对死刑的争论。

auth_sentence.content: Man sharpens man, the way steel sharpens steel.
auth_sentence.res_content: Man sharpens man, the way steel sharpens steel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Man sharpens man, the way steel sharpens steel.

auth_sentence.content: The consideration of a textual crux in itself sharpens the wits.
auth_sentence.res_content: The consideration of a textual crux in itself sharpens the wits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The consideration of a textual crux in itself sharpens the wits.

auth_sentence.content: But everyone sharpens at a different angle.
auth_sentence.res_content: But everyone sharpens at a different angle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But everyone sharpens at a different angle.
